blocks.name: cucn
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the uniform continuity operation.

blocks.name: df-ucn
blocks.content: Define a function on two uniform structures which value is the set of uniformly continuous functions from the first uniform structure to the second. A function ` f ` is uniformly continuous if, roughly speaking, it is possible to guarantee that ` ( f `` x ) ` and ` ( f `` y ) ` be as close to each other as we please by requiring only that ` x ` and ` y ` are sufficiently close to each other; unlike ordinary continuity, the maximum distance between ` ( f `` x ) ` and ` ( f `` y ) ` cannot depend on ` x ` and ` y ` themselves. This formulation is the definition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.6. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: ucnval
blocks.content: The set of all uniformly continuous function from uniform space ` U ` to uniform space ` V ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Nov-2017.)

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c3))‚Üí(c0[uCn]c2)= { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà c1,(s3[s2]s4 ‚Üí(s0 ` s3)[s1](s0 ` s4))))))})

blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is a uniformly continuous function from uniform space ` U ` to uniform space ` V ` ". (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Nov-2017.)

thm ucnimalem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  a1ii(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cxp(c1, c1), cop(cfv(c2, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cust, c1))))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cxp(c1, c1), cop(cfv(c2, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(cust, c5))))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cxp(c1, c1), cop(cfv(c2, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c3, cucn, c4))))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cxp(c1, c1), cop(cfv(c2, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), wi(w0, wcel(c6, c4)))
  eqtr4i(c0, cmpt(s0, cxp(c1, c1), cop(cfv(c2, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))))), cmpo(s1, s2, c1, c1, cop(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, cv(s2)))))
  mpt2mpt(s0, s1, s2, c1, c1, cop(cfv(c2, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))), cop(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, cv(s2))))

  fveq2d(c2, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cv(s1), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  op1std(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2))
  fveq2d(c2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cv(s2), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))

thm ucnimalem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(s0 ‚àà(c1 √ó c1)‚Ü¶ <(c2 `(1st ` s0)),(c2 `(2nd ` s0))>)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(c3[uCn]c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s1 ‚àà c1, s2 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ <(c2 ` s1),(c2 ` s2)>)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(c0 =(s0 ‚àà(c1 √ó c1)‚Ü¶ <(c2 `(1st ` s0)),(c2 `(2nd ` s0))>), (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)))
  a1ii(c0 =(s0 ‚àà(c1 √ó c1)‚Ü¶ <(c2 `(1st ` s0)),(c2 `(2nd ` s0))>), (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c5)))
  a1ii(c0 =(s0 ‚àà(c1 √ó c1)‚Ü¶ <(c2 `(1st ` s0)),(c2 `(2nd ` s0))>), (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(c3[uCn]c4)))
  a1ii(c0 =(s0 ‚àà(c1 √ó c1)‚Ü¶ <(c2 `(1st ` s0)),(c2 `(2nd ` s0))>), (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà c4))
  eqtr4i(c0, (s0 ‚àà(c1 √ó c1)‚Ü¶ <(c2 `(1st ` s0)),(c2 `(2nd ` s0))>), (s1 ‚àà c1, s2 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ <(c2 ` s1),(c2 ` s2)>))
  mpt2mpt(s0, s1, s2, c1, c1, <(c2 `(1st ` s0)),(c2 `(2nd ` s0))>, <(c2 ` s1),(c2 ` s2)>)
  opeq12d((c2 `(1st ` s0)), (c2 `(2nd ` s0)), (c2 ` s1), (c2 ` s2), s0 = < s1, s2 >)
  fveq2d(c2, (1st ` s0), s1, s0 = < s1, s2 >)
  op1std(s0, s1, s2)
  fveq2d(c2, (2nd ` s0), s2, s0 = < s1, s2 >)
  op2ndd(s0, s1, s2)
  vex(s1)
  vex(s2)
  diff.cop.s(s0, (c2 ` s1), (c2 ` s2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cop.s(s1, (c2 `(1st ` s0)), (c2 `(2nd ` s0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, (1st ` s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1st, s0)

  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, (2nd ` s0))

blocks.name: ucnprima
blocks.content: The preimage by a uniformly continuous function ` F ` of an entourage ` W ` of ` Y ` is an entourage of ` X ` . Note of the definition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.6. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ucnprima(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cust, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(cust, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, co(c2, cucn, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cop(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), cfv(c6, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), c2), wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c1))))
  mpbid(w0, wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c1))), wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cima(c0, cv(hs0)), c1)))
  ucnima(hs0, s0, s1, c2, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  rexbidva(hs0, c2, w0, wss(cima(c0, cv(hs0)), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c1)))
  sylancr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wb(wss(cima(c0, cv(hs0)), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c1))), wfun(c0), wss(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))
  mpt2fun(s0, s1, c0, c3, c3, cop(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), cfv(c6, cv(s1))))
  syl6sseqr(cv(hs0), cdm(c0), cxp(c3, c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c3, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(cust, c3)))
  ustssxp(c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  funimass3(c0, cv(hs0), c1)
  rexlimdva(hs0, c2, w0, wss(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), c2))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(cust, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cxp(c3, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c2, cfv(cust, c3)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cxp(c3, c3)))
  sseqtri(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cxp(c3, c3), cdm(c0))
  cnvimass(c0, c1)
  dmmpt2(s0, s1, c0, c3, c3, cop(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), cfv(c6, cv(s1))))
  opex(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), cfv(c6, cv(s1)))
  ustssel(c2, c3, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c1))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), c2))
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(`' c0 " c1)‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c5))

  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c6)

blocks.name: ucncn
blocks.content: Uniform continuity implies continuity. Deduction form. Proposition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.6. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Nov-2017.)
